page.title: 12Armed Forces
page.content: One corner of our area includes some married quarters of the Royal Air Force Station at Benson. Some of these houses are within the electoral district of Ewelme though few ever exercise the right to vote in local elections. The unit is the home of the Queens Flight which functions to provide air tansport for HM The Queen and other members of the Royal Family going about their business. Sometimes they travel by helicopter and at other times they use propeller driven aircraft called Andovers.
